Legislative History of Laws

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 9 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act) . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-1109

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: An unincorporated nonprofit association shall have the capacity to sue and be sued in its own name.
A member or a manager may assert a claim the member or manager has against an unincorporated nonprofit association. An association may assert a claim it has against a member or a manager.
